data.text:
@perthnow That's okay. We are all so poop scared now to go out except for essential items so I guess you could say that opening the borders to facilitate trade and get the public out and about was a negative.

We've all seen what covid does to people and so we are wise and cautious now.

@perthnow @MarkMcGowanMP Scott Morisson  PM need to learn from WA PM Mark McGowan giving to all WA households delivered home free 5 RAT tests. One of best ways to reduce virus spread and identifying individuals and cluster area having virus infections.
@nico470011 @perthnow Oh dear, poor sole wish you all the best in your future. You really need to put things in perspective. I really feel for you believing you have a need to make those comments.

@perthnow Positive case counts remain high through much of the world, yet emergency powers, mandates and measures continue to fall away. Are we dealing with a different virus in WA? So much division through our community, This isnâ€™t the WA I knew and loved.
@perthnow Number of deaths is the key. If WA gets out of this pandemic year with 20-50% deaths than the other states, MM has done his job and all you haters can lick his shoes.
@perthnow The pandemic is over in most of the world. We're still pretending that it's 2020 in WA
